bill_title: provide for legislative redistricting based on single-member house districts.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to provide for legislative redistricting based on single-member house districts. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. The Executive Board of the Legislative Research Council shall instruct any interim committee on legislative redistricting that it is the declared intent of the Legislature to provide for single-member house districts at the 2011 redistricting for any area that includes all or part of five or more counties. The interim committee shall draw and report no redistricting plan that does not incorporate such single-member house districts. 135 copies were printed on recycled paper by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.075 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
